title: Public Read Access for PHI Bucket
description: S3 bucket containing Protected Health Information (PHI) is configured with public read access
reasoning: Public read access allows anyone on the internet to read sensitive healthcare data, violating HIPAA privacy requirements and potentially exposing confidential patient information

title: Incomplete Public Access Controls
description: Inconsistent public access blocking configuration with security gaps
reasoning: Partial public access blocking creates potential exposure vectors for sensitive healthcare data

title: Missing Server-Side Encryption
description: No server-side encryption configured for PHI data storage bucket
reasoning: Unencrypted storage of Protected Health Information violates data protection standards and increases risk of unauthorized data access

title: Missing Access Logging
description: No logging configuration for PHI data storage bucket
reasoning: Lack of access logging prevents forensic analysis and compliance tracking for sensitive healthcare data
